about:
Hey! It's Marcus!

I love playing Avicade and Control The Hill.

----------------------------------------------
Achievements Unlocked
----------------------------------------------

CTH-

Reached lvl 40+

Had a Killstreak of 34 in under 30 seconds

Killed 9 people with 1 grenade.

Shot and killed 30+ enemies with Marksman

Had a total of 82 kills in one game. (We kept tying and the score went on and on)


Avicade-

Killed 6 people in under 6 seconds as minotaur

Made a player fall in to the void by running them in front on Red Alert.

Killed 2 people at once on snake

Pushed an enemy out of the map on Ghosts
